subject: Soccer
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Eduardo Deluca, general secretary of Conmebol, the South American soccer federation, said its three votes for the 2018 World Cup would go to the joint bid from Spain and Portugal.
snippet: Eduardo Deluca, general secretary of Conmebol, the South American soccer federation, said its three votes for the 2018 World Cup would go to the joint bid from Spain and Portugal.
